document_title: Colloid goiter: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: buou-giap-keo.json_2_Subjects susceptible to thyroid colloid goiter
subsection_content:
Risk factors include: (2)
Female; People over 40 years old; Insufficient iodine in the diet; Living in an endemic area; Have a family history of goiter
